name: blitzar
description: A Vue component collection for blitzing fast prototyping âš¡

scripts.dev: npm run prepare && cd packages/dev && npm run dev
scripts.dev:docs: npm run prepare && cd packages/docs && npm run dev
scripts.dev:vuepress: npm run prepare && cd packages/docs-vuepress && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run prepare && lerna run build
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:form && npm run prepare:table
scripts.prepare:form: npm run copy:form-to-docs && npm run copy:form-to-vuepress && npm run copy:form-to-dev
scripts.prepare:table: npm run copy:table-to-docs && npm run copy:table-to-vuepress && npm run copy:table-to-dev
scripts.dep:update-all: ncu --semverLevel major -u && lerna exec 'ncu --semverLevel major -u' && npm run dep:install
scripts.dep:reinstall-all: rimraf node_modules && lerna clean -y && npm run dep:install

author: Luca Ban - Mesqueeb
